inclusion.criterion: female sex, PV and BNP at baseline were correlated with AS progression
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: resting mean gradient (MG) >35 mmHg and exercise-induced increase in MG >20 mmHg
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: global longitudinal strain (GLS) might be useful to assess subtle changes in LV function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: longitudinal, radial and circumferential strain and strain rate (SR) deteriorate with aortic valve disease progression
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: progression rates begin from 0.15±0.01 m/s/y in population without cardiovascular risk factors
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: high progressors are those that have at least one abnormal parameter of the followings: echocardiography parameters, clinical predictors, and biological parameters
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: positive stress test (symptoms including dyspnoea, angina, syncope, ECG pathological changes, WMA)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and presents with fevers/rigors, bandemia, and abdominal mass. She underwent EUS with biopsy, which showed pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
